aspects.description: Required database tables exist with proper structure
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check database contains users, courses, chapters, mentors, enrollments, credit_transactions, mentor_sessions tables with correct column names and types
Test: Verify foreign key constraints exist (course_id in chapters, user_id in mentors, etc.) and can query related data successfully
Test: Database contains realistic data for all entities - users, courses, mentors with expected relationships

aspects.description: Required admin accounts with correct passwords
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Login with admin@ssa.org/skills2025admin1 and alice@example.com/WtfiA? both succeed and show admin interface

aspects.description: SQL dump file provided at correct location
aspects.extraDescription: Test: File db/db-dump.sql exists and contains complete database schema with data

judgementScoreDescription: Poor project organization with mixed concerns and unclear structure
Basic organization with some separation of concerns but inconsistent patterns
Good organization following framework conventions with clear separation
Excellent organization with modular structure, clear separation of concerns, and maintainable architecture

aspects.extraDescription: Test: Navigate to /login, form contains username/password fields and submits correctly

aspects.description: Invalid login credentials show appropriate error
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Login with wrong password displays clear error message and prevents access

aspects.description: Non-admin users cannot access admin interface
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Login with regular user account redirects away from admin pages or shows access denied
Test: Admin login automatically redirects to /dashboard and displays admin interface
Test: Dashboard shows counts for registered learners, total courses, active mentors, and total credits earned

aspects.description: Recent activities table displays last 6 activities
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Table shows Activity, Learner/Mentor, and Time columns with realistic relative time format (1h ago, 2d ago, etc.)

aspects.description: Quick navigation links to management pages
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Dashboard contains working links to Learner Management, Course Management, and Mentor Management pages

judgementScoreDescription: Poor dashboard layout with confusing information presentation and unclear navigation
Basic dashboard layout but some usability issues for quick administrative overview
Good dashboard with clear sections and intuitive layout for administrative tasks
Excellent dashboard with optimal layout, clear information hierarchy, and efficient administrative workflow

aspects.description: Learner list displays with required information
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Page shows learner list with name, email, chapters completed, credits earned, and account status

aspects.description: Search functionality by name or email
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Single search input filters learners by entering partial name or email, results update dynamically
Test: Filter dropdown shows All, Active, Suspended options and filters learners when selection changes

aspects.description: Clear filters button resets search and filter
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Clear filters button resets search input and filter dropdown, showing all learners

aspects.description: Pagination controls display 10 learners per page
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Page shows maximum 10 learners with Previous/Next buttons and page numbers for navigation
Test: Buttons to suspend/enable users work and update status in database and interface immediately

aspects.description: Course list displays with complete information
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Page shows courses with title, description, difficulty, total chapters, and total credits
Test: Create course button opens form, saves new course with all fields, and updates course list

aspects.description: Edit course form with chapter editing button
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Edit button opens populated form, includes inactive 'Edit Chapters' button as specified
Test: Delete shows custom confirmation dialog (not browser popup), removes course and chapters but preserves completion records
Test: Page shows mentors with name, hourly credit rate, years of experience, average rating, approval status
Test: Approve button for pending mentors changes status to active and updates interface immediately
Test: Check database shows hashed passwords (bcrypt/similar), not plain text passwords
Test: Admin pages are inaccessible to non-admin users, redirect or show access denied
Test: Logout button ends session, subsequent admin page access requires re-login
Test: Form inputs use prepared statements/ORM, SQL injection attempts in search fields do not execute
Test: Form inputs are validated, XSS attempts in form fields are escaped/sanitized in output

aspects.description: SkillShare Academy branding and logo display
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Header contains SkillShare Academy logo and branding elements consistently across all pages
Test: Interface uses specified purple-orange-cyan color palette consistently in buttons, headers, and UI elements

aspects.description: User information display and logout access
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Header shows logged-in admin name and logout button is accessible from all pages

aspects.description: Consistent navigation across all admin pages
aspects.extraDescription: Test: All admin pages have same header, navigation menu with Dashboard, Learner Management, Course Management, Mentor Management
